subject: Severe Water Damage in Kitchen Module
description: The kitchen module in our Cozy Cottage 1200 has significant water damage. The subflooring is warped and there's visible mold growth. This seems like a manufacturing defect as the seals around windows and doors are inadequate. We need immediate attention as this is affecting our family's health.

subject: Delivery 3 Weeks Late - No Communication
description: Our Family Haven 1800 was supposed to be delivered on March 1st, but it's now March 22nd and we still haven't received it. We've called multiple times but get different answers each time. We have contractors waiting and are paying storage fees for materials. This is completely unacceptable.

subject: Foundation Bolts Missing - Installation Halted
description: Our installation crew arrived to set up the Executive Manor 2500 but discovered that the foundation bolt kit is completely missing from the shipment. Installation cannot proceed without these critical components. We need expedited shipping as our crew is scheduled for other jobs.

subject: Electrical Issues - Outlets Not Working
description: Multiple electrical outlets in our Twin Vista Duplex are not functioning. The electrical inspection failed and we cannot get occupancy permits. It appears the wiring was not completed properly during manufacturing. This is delaying our rental income by weeks.

subject: Door Frame Warped - Won't Close Properly
description: The main entrance door on our Backyard Studio 400 is warped and won't close properly. The frame appears to have shifted during shipping. We can't secure the building and weather is getting in. Need replacement door frame and installation support.

subject: Wrong Model Delivered
description: We ordered a Retail Flex 1500 for our business but received a Cozy Cottage 1200 instead. This is completely wrong for our commercial needs. We need the correct unit delivered immediately and the wrong one picked up. This mistake is costing us business.

subject: Premium Kitchen Package - Defective Appliances
description: Two of the appliances in our Premium Kitchen Package are defective. The dishwasher leaks and the microwave doesn't heat properly. These appear to be manufacturing defects, not shipping damage. We need replacement appliances and compensation for the inconvenience.

subject: Solar Power System Installation Problems
description: The Solar Power System installation has multiple issues. The inverter is the wrong model for our configuration, and several panels arrived cracked. The installation manual is also incorrect for our system. Need complete system review and corrections.

subject: Minor Finishing Issues - Cozy Cottage 1200
description: Overall very happy with our second Cozy Cottage 1200, but there are a few minor finishing issues. Some trim pieces are slightly misaligned and there's a small scratch on the front door. Nothing major, but would like these addressed when convenient.

subject: Delivery Schedule Coordination
description: Need to coordinate delivery of our Family Haven 1800 with our site preparation. The communication has been much better than our previous order, but would like to confirm the exact delivery window to schedule our foundation contractor.

subject: Window Screen Installation Question
description: The window screens for our Executive Manor 2500 don't seem to fit quite right. The installation manual isn't clear on the attachment method. Could someone provide clearer instructions or a video tutorial? Quality overall is much improved from our previous order.

subject: Excellent Service - Minor Request
description: Just wanted to say the Twin Vista Duplex delivery and installation went perfectly this time! Much improved from our 2020 experience. One small request - could we get an extra set of keys? We seem to be missing one set from the delivery package.

subject: Paint Touch-up Kit Request
description: Our Backyard Studio 400 arrived in excellent condition. Very impressed with the quality improvements over the years. Could we get a paint touch-up kit for future maintenance? Want to keep it looking new.

subject: HVAC Efficiency Question
description: The HVAC system in our new Retail Flex 1500 is working well, but we're wondering if there are any efficiency tips or maintenance schedules you'd recommend. Want to maximize energy savings for our business.

subject: Warranty Information Request
description: Very satisfied with our Premium Kitchen Package. Everything works perfectly and installation was smooth. Just need clarification on the warranty terms for the appliances - want to make sure we're covered properly.

subject: Solar Performance Monitoring
description: Our Solar Power System has been working great for months. The installation was professional and efficient. Could you provide information about performance monitoring options or apps to track our energy production?

subject: Referral Program Information
description: We've been so happy with our Fabrikam homes that we want to refer friends and family. Do you have a referral program? Also, when we show people our homes, they're always impressed with the quality and craftsmanship.

subject: Expansion Options Inquiry
description: Love our current Family Haven 1800! As our family grows, we're considering adding on. What expansion options do you offer? The construction quality has been excellent and we want to stay with Fabrikam for any additions.

subject: ONGOING: Executive Manor 2500 - HVAC Compressor Failure
description: The HVAC compressor in our Executive Manor 2500 has failed for the THIRD time. This is clearly a systemic issue with this model year (2020). We need a permanent solution, not another temporary fix. This has been ongoing since delivery and multiple replacements haven't solved the root cause.

subject: ONGOING: Executive Manor 2500 - Second HVAC Failure
description: Follow-up to FAB-2020-005. The replacement HVAC compressor has failed again after only 8 months. This is unacceptable. We're starting to think there's a design flaw in the 2020 Executive Manor 2500 HVAC system. Need engineering review.

subject: ONGOING: Executive Manor 2500 - Third HVAC Failure Investigation
description: This is getting ridiculous. Third HVAC compressor failure in 2 years. We've been loyal customers but this ongoing issue is testing our patience. Need a comprehensive engineering review and permanent solution. Are other 2020 Executive Manor 2500 customers having this issue?

subject: ONGOING: Executive Manor 2500 - Demanding Engineering Solution
description: Latest update on our chronic HVAC issues. We've identified that the problem seems to be related to insufficient refrigerant line sizing for the compressor load in the 2020 model. Your engineering team needs to approve a complete system redesign or we'll need to explore legal options. This has been going on for 4 years!

subject: Smart Home Integration Question
description: Our new Twin Vista Duplex is fantastic! The quality is outstanding compared to our 2020 model. We're interested in integrating smart home technology. Do you have recommended systems or partnerships for home automation with your units?

subject: Sustainability Certifications
description: We're thrilled with our new Backyard Studio 400! The build quality is exceptional. For our business, we need to know about any sustainability certifications (LEED, Energy Star, etc.) that this model might qualify for. Can you provide documentation?

subject: Expedite Request - Family Event Approaching
description: We have our Executive Manor 2500 scheduled for delivery but just learned about a family wedding in September that will be hosted at our property. Is there any way to expedite the delivery process? We understand there may be additional costs involved. The unit will serve as additional accommodations for out-of-town guests.

subject: Installation Crew Availability in Miami
description: Our dual Cozy Cottage 1200 units arrived yesterday and they look fantastic! However, we're having trouble finding certified installation crews in the Miami area. Can you provide a list of recommended local contractors? We're eager to get these set up as vacation rentals ASAP.

subject: Positive Feedback - Exceptional Quality
description: I wanted to reach out to express how impressed we are with our new Family Haven 1800. The build quality is outstanding, delivery was on time, and the installation crew was professional and thorough. This is our second Fabrikam home (upgraded from a 2021 model) and the improvements are remarkable. Thank you for an excellent experience!

subject: Color Customization Confirmation
description: We're excited about our Modern Studio 1800 currently in production! During our recent call, we discussed changing the exterior siding color from standard gray to forest green. Can you confirm this change has been applied to our order? Also, is there a way to get progress photos during production?

subject: Foundation Preparation Guidelines
description: Our Executive Manor 2500 is in production and we're preparing the foundation site. Could you provide the latest foundation specifications and preparation guidelines? We want to ensure everything meets current building codes in Washington state. Our contractor is asking about drainage requirements specifically.

subject: Multi-Unit Package Delivery Logistics
description: We just placed an order for a Backyard Studio 400 plus multiple accessory buildings for our Austin property. This will be used as a creative workspace and guest accommodation. Can you coordinate delivery timing so all units arrive together? Also interested in bulk pricing for future orders as we're expanding our property development business.
